Package Networking

Provides classes necessary for Networking aspect of Game
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChatListener
    Simple interface used by the client for listening for chat events from the server and directly communicating with the GUI
    ServerConnectionListener
    Listens for changes in the connection between the server and a client
    ServerListener
    Acts as direct communication for Server to GamePanel
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChatEvent
    A simple event representing a chat message from another client
    ClientHandler
    Handler for each individual client connected to server
    ClientService
    Connects and transfers information between client and server
    GameStateEvent
    A event symbolizing a change in the state of the game (win, lose, tie)
    ServerConnectionEvent
    A event representing a change in the connection between the server and client This change may be intentional or unexpected
    ServerService
    Handles client connections and information transferred from clients
